doc:
Norman Foster (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Foster_(director) 0 Norman Foster (born Norman Foster Hoeffer, December 13, 1903 – July 7, 1976) was an American actor, film director and screenwriter. He directed many Charlie Chan and Mr. Moto films as well as projects for Orson Welles and Walt Disney. As an actor he was a leading man in early talkies and also appeared in Welles’ final film The Other Side of the Wind. Norman_Foster ( born Norman_Foster_Hoeffer , December_13_,_1903 – July_7_,_1976 ) was an_American_actor , film_director_and_screenwriter . He directed many_Charlie_Chan and Mr._Moto films as_well as projects for Orson_Welles and Walt_Disney . As an_actor he was a_leading_man in early_talkies and also appeared in Welles ’_final_film The_Other_Side of the_Wind .
